job.title: Data Scientist (Research)
job.description: puPosition OverviewuppThe Research Data Scientist primary responsibility will be in medical device safety and surveillance activities using realworld data from the NESTcc Research Network and data partners This position will utilize their expertise to use novel data science tools to perform statistical analysis on large complex datasets in order to uncover medical device safety signals or trends within the Active Surveillance environmentppbrppuObjectives and Responsibilitiesupp Develop data analytic programs within active surveillance for medical device safety and reliabilityppnbspEstablish data analytics infrastructure to improve efficiency and to facilitate datadriven decisions ppnbspDevelop and implement machine learning algorithms and predictive modelsanalyticspp Create automated data analysis workflow and meaningful data visualization dashboards in support of trend reporting and escalation pp Utilize various data science programming tools to include Python Java R and SQL ppnbspUtilizes various statistical techniques and reliability tools such as Hadoop Cloudera Data Science Workbench Minitab JMP or Jupyter Notebook ppnbspUtilize various data visualization tools such as Tableau Power BI or Spotfire ppnbspCoordinate data quality security maintenance ppnbspEstablish policies and procedures related to data collection and accuracy of datappnbspWorking with Network Collaborators to integrate their data into the cloud environmentppnbspProvide endtoend data integration ppnbspData intake data quality assessmentevaluation data curation enrichmentpreparationppnbspDesign and implement scalable data integration processes including ingestion cleaning curation unification etcppnbspDevelop tools to support data profiling and data quality methodologiesppbrppuRequirementsupulliGraduate Degree in Biostatistics Bioinformatics Data Science Machine Learning Epidemiology or similar quantitative disciplinelili5 years working as a data scientist or biostatisticianliliProficiency in Python R SQLliliExperience with AI frameworks and MLOps principlesliliKnowledge of big data analytics approaches using cloud services from Google Cloud Platform preferred AWS or AzureliliFamiliarity with healthcare data and sources of realworld data for safety signal detectionliulpbrppuOther SkillsAbilitiesupulliStrong problemsolving and analytical skillsliliAbility to handle confidential and sensitive company information responsiblyliliWorking knowledge of 21 CFR 820 FDA QSR ISO 13485 preferredliliExperience using RWDRWE from multiple sources is a plusliliExperience with healthcare common data models such as OMOP i2b2 or PCORnet a plusliliAbility to translate technical jargon into laymans terms for explanatory purposesliulpnbspppuReporting RelationshipsuppnbspThe employee will report to the Director of Medical Device Safety NESTccppbrppTo Apply email your resume to careersmdicorg with Research Data Scientist NESTcc as the subject of the email Please include a cover letter with your resumeppbrppNOTEnbspThis scope of services is not intended to be allinclusive The Data Scientist may perform other related duties ppemMDIC is an Equal Opportunity Employeremppbrp
